concept.title: Expansion Board
concept.shortdesc: Yeastar S100 and S300 are expandable.

ul.li: S100 supports up to 2 EX08/EX30 Expansion Boards; supports 1 D30 Module.
S300 supports up to 3 EX08/EX30 Expansion Boards; supports up to 2 D30 Modules.

section.title: EX08 Expansion Board
section.p: EX08 board supports up to 4 modules (8 RJ11 ports).

section.title: D30 Module
section.p: D30 is a DSP module, used to expand the capacity of PBX. With a D30 module added, the extensions increase 100 and concurrent calls increase 30 additionally.
